name: Bumblefree
description:
Mumble the Bumblebee found a nice perch to rest his little wings on and is sleeping soundly. When he suddenly wakes up he is shocked and confused! His entrance has been blocked off by an invisible barrier! Poor Mumble now has to find his way out of the scary place and there no time to wait.

Game jam+ descriptor:

Chosen theme: 

-I want to be free

Diversifiers:

  1. Minimal Controls
  2. Take care of yourself!
  3. fonts.google.com
  4. Count on me
  5. Remix

#PC

Team:

Bumblebutt Studios:

  • Pontus Johansson - Programming, Music
  • Lars Skjuttorp - Music, Sound
  • Cecilia Larsson Lyblad -  Graphics, Animations
  • Cim Broström - Dialogue, Graphics

Game made in Skövde, Sweden. Made with Unity Engine.
